verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: called] out [ARG1: NFL players who “ take a knee ” during the national anthem Friday] , [ARGM-ADV: saying their protests “ are n’t a real issue ”] ...
President Trump called out [ARG0: NFL players] [R-ARG0: who] “ [V: take] [ARG1: a knee] ” [ARGM-TMP: during the national anthem Friday] , saying their protests “ are n’t a real issue ” ...
[ARG0: President Trump] called out NFL players who “ take a knee ” during the national anthem Friday , [V: saying] [ARG1: their protests “ are n’t a real issue ”] ...
President Trump called out NFL players who “ take a knee ” during the national anthem Friday , saying [ARG1: their protests] “ [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [ARG2: a real issue] ” ...
